text.title: part5_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes
text.p: Jada: It’s really rare you get people saying that.
Alex: I’m still high from the session, because of that conversation we had and he thinks this is going to make him a better person.

p.hi: DS: That you are going to help him.

text.p: Alex: Yeah, because he feels that way. I don’t know if this type of thing…it definitely wouldn’t help everybody out there, but it helps some people.

p.hi: DS: The people who see you, it does help them.

text.p: Alex: Well, yeah, you know, for some people it is just a means to an end—it’s the only way they can get off, or whatever. I don’t judge anyone. But I find it really fascinating, all the different types.

p.hi: DS: Are they typically embarrassed when they first start coming in here?

text.p: Alex: Some are, and some aren’t.
Jada: Yeah, some are and some aren’t.

p.hi: DS: Depending on their experience or their comfort level?

text.p: Alex: I think it depends on how people have reacted to them in the past, as you can imagine.
Jada: Like the guy I was seeing. He was originally very nervous.
Alex: Yeah, he was probably embarrassed.
Jada: We’ve had a few people come in, get nervous, and are like, “I…I…I don’t know what I should say, or what I can tell you.”
text.head: Psychological challenges

p.hi: DS: How do you make them feel comfortable?

text.p: Jada: Anything they have to say, you’ve heard it before! [Laughs]

Alex: Yeah, sometimes they are like, “Oh, this might sound weird…” and I’m like, “Trust me, it doesn’t sound weird!” Not to make them feel like they are one of a thousand. I try to let them know that I appreciate their being honest with me, and I find it interesting.

p.hi: DS: What do you think in your own histories has made you so non-judgmental?

text.p: Alex: Well, that would be getting into personal information I wouldn’t want to talk about.
Jada: Yeah. You can’t be judgmental in this industry. You have to be open-minded.

p.hi: DS: Alex, do people ever come in with fantasies that are Iraq War-related.

text.p: Jada: I’ve had some like that. There have been a few fetishes that are racial play, or war related. Nazis.
Alex: People come here with things to work out. Maybe they’ve been traumatized or maybe they have some issue. They come here with things. I haven’t run into anyone, but I wouldn’t be surprised.
Alex: Yeah. I have definitely seen vets before, I know I have.

p.hi: DS: So you were saying you have war-related?

text.p: Jada: I’m not sure how it develops with an individual. But usually the request is a specific type of role play, like I am the German Nazi and this is the Jew and I have to punish him in some sense.
